Text: Madge Ryan (8 January 1919 – 9 January 1994) was an Australian actress, known for her stage roles in the United Kingdom, including London productions of "Entertaining Mr Sloane" (1964), "Philadelphia, Here I Come" (1967), and "Medea" (1993).
